data.eml:eml: Recognizing diversity in blennioid fish nomenclature (Teleostei: Blennioidei)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hastings, Philip A., Springer, Victor G. (2009): Recognizing diversity in blennioid fish nomenclature (Teleostei: Blennioidei). Zootaxa 2120: 3-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188099
